name: LOOP: A Tranquil Puzzle Game (itch)
description:
Now includes a procedural level generator with 1 BILLION possible levels!

~~~

LOOP is a tranquil puzzle game for PC, Mac & Linux.

Also available for purchase on iOS and Android see links below!

DEMO AVAILABLE!

~~~

I wanted LOOP to feel very zen and focused, so I made the UI minimal; there's no timers or move limit or score, you can just relax and engage with the puzzle alone.

By doing this I aimed to give the game a unique, simple, meditative feel.

Complete each level by swapping the hexagon pieces until all the lines link up, revealing the final pattern.

Later levels introduce spinning pieces and colour changing pieces also!

The full game has 100 Levels.

If you get stuck on a level you can play each set in any order by going to 'level select' in the menu!

The full game includes a colour blind mode.
